lead_paragraph: Hannah Eddy asked her boss if her new job came with a boyfriend. In fact, she ended up marrying this colleague, Rodney Andrews.
snippet: Hannah Eddy asked her boss if her new job came with a boyfriend. In fact, she ended up marrying this colleague, Rodney Andrews.

headline.main: She Went to a College for a Job, and Found a Husband, Too
headline.print_headline: She Got the Job, and the Husband, Too

abstract: Vows column on wedding of Hannah Eddy and Rodney Andrews.
